name: Chained Stunts: Car Ramp Race
description:
Chained Stunts: Car Ramp Race is a new fast and unique ramp in car racing simulator. In this furious endless runner rivals car chain breaker taxi car driving game, you are dealing with two joined cars and your task is to limit your speed crazy offroad bus vs Prado Jeep traffic racing.Chained cars look simple game but it needs special driving & parking skills and perfect car driver to maintain speed before it clashes while racing.
FEATURES

• Detailed 3d Environment
• Smooth and Realistic Chained Cars Controls
• Lots of challenging Missions
• Multiple cars to choose from
• Beautiful Asphalt Racing Tracks
• Realistic Sound effects
